context.expression: user.role === 'chw' && user._id != contact._id && summary.alive && summary.isFamilyPerson && !summary.muted && (contact.type === 'person' && (!contact.date_of_birth || ((ageInYears(contact) >= 12 && ageInYears(contact) < 60) && (!contact.sex || contact.sex === 'female' || contact.sex === 'femme' || contact.sex === 'Femme'))))
